label: Ebola (Dudas et al, 2017)
description: 1610 Ebola sequences (18,996 sites) covering the 2014-16 West Africa outbreak

label: Ebola (Gire et al, 2014)
description: 81 sequences Ebola sequences (18,959 sites) covering the first few months of the 2014-16 West Africa outbreak

label: H3N2 (Rambaut et al, 2008)
description: 165 H3N2 HA sequences (1698 sites) for 3 waves of influenza A in New York covering 2000-2003

label: H5N1 (Andersen lab, 2025)
description: 3339 H5N1 genotype B3.13 sequences (all segments concatenated - 13,136 sites) covering the 2024-25 US _cattle_ outbreak (excludes sequences found in non-cattle hosts).

label: MPOX (O'Toole et al, 2023)
description: 41 mpox sequences (197,209 sites) around the 2017-2020 Nigerian mpox outbreak that turned into the 2021-2022 worldwide mpox outbreak

label: MPOX (Parker et al, 2025)
description: 177 mpox sequences (197,209 sites), almost all from Nigeria, mostly preceding the 2021-2022 worlwide mpox outbreak

label: SARS-CoV-2 (Lemieux et al, 2021)
description: 757 SARS-CoV-2 sequences (29,903 sites) from Massachussetts in the first months of the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic (2020-)
data_description: data source: GenBank, accession IDs obtained from authors

label: Zika (Metsky et al, 2017)
description: 174 Zika virus sequences (10,807 sites) from the Americas spanning the 2015-16 Zika outbreak
data_description: data source: SI from the paper
